contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111420000.text: Is it going well with you? It's okay if you really can't find it... Science allows for failures!

111420001.text: Sorry for disappointing you. No failures this time. The anomaly was inside a tent. It didn't get any better at concealing itself

111420002.text: I already found it. The anomaly is in a tent this time. Wasn't easy to find it

111420003.text: That's good! To be honest, after so many successes, I felt it was about time the sensor experiences a failure or two...

111420004.text: But who could've known that my dear sensor is so good? It's hard to get it to fail even once!

111420005.text: I'll let you know asap if I get another ping. You should hurry and bring back the fruit of victory, too!
